name: The Bard's Tale 3: Thief of Fate
name_original: The Bard's Tale 3: Thief of Fate
description:
The Bard's Tale 3: Thief of Fate is a RPG game developed by Interplay Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1990. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
The Bard's Tale 3: Thief of Fate is available on PC and Commodore / Amiga.
